title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - Sanctuary of Sameiro - Portugal Landmarks
description:
In this video we will look at the Sanctuary of Sameiro is located in Braga and not far from Sanctuary of Bom Jesus do Monte. The nearest airfield is the Braga airport (LPBR). 

In the surroundings of Braga more and more POI's pop up so it is definitely worth visiting the city using MSFS

If you would like to try the scenery yourself, download it via the link below:
https://flightsim.to/file/31059/sanctuary-of-sameiro-braga-portugal
